knimeNode.name: String to TimeStamp
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a String column into a column holding time stamps.

fullDescription.intro: This node wraps all cells of a column into time stamp cells. The node will replace the column from the input table.

option.name: Columns containing Strings holding time information

fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing the timestamp string.

ports.dataOut: Table with replaced column holding timestamp cells.
